title: Literary landmarks of Edinburgh,
author: Hutton, Laurence
snippet: Herethe " Waverley Novels " were planned and discussed,and were read from manuscript or advance-sheetsto the happy and select few in the secret of theGreat Unknown. Ballantyne's printing-office wasnear the foot of Leith Wynd, now Cranston Street,and is at present an upholstery and cabinet-makingestablishment.

title: Literary landmarks of Edinburgh,
author: Hutton, Laurence
snippet: Craig's Close, 35. Cranston Street, 53. Creech's Land, 31, 33.
